text: Carole Hersee (born 25 November 1958) is an English costume designer known for being the "Test Card Girl" on BBC. She is the most aired face in British television history. Paul Sawtell, ‘Hersee, George (1924–2001)’, Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, January 2005 ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:People from Surrey
title: Carole Hersee
